value.fullName: Communicate openly, honestly and with an open heart
value.label: Communicate openly, honestly and with an open heart

value.fullName: Say what you mean; listen to others and be open to new ideas
value.label: Say what you mean; listen to others and be open to new ideas

value.fullName: Behave in a consistent and predictable manner
value.label: Behave in a consistent and predictable manner

value.fullName: Speak up when something is not right and address the difficult issues
value.label: Speak up when something is not right and address the difficult issues

value.fullName: Seek to put forth meaningful discussion and willingly share information to achieve positive outcomes
value.label: Seek to put forth meaningful discussion and willingly share information to achieve positive outcomes

value.fullName: Share knowledge and information that is accurate and complete
value.label: Share knowledge and information that is accurate and complete

value.fullName: Provide timely, positive and constructive feedback
value.label: Provide timely, positive and constructive feedback

value.fullName: Listen to understand and seek to be understood
value.label: Listen to understand and seek to be understood

value.fullName: Show genuine interest in other individuals and be accepting of others
value.label: Show genuine interest in other individuals and be accepting of others

value.fullName: Uphold integrity in our actions and conduct in accordance to Teleflex ‘s ethical standards
value.label: Uphold integrity in our actions and conduct in accordance to Teleflex ‘s ethical standards

value.fullName: Follow-up, honor commitment and deliver promises
value.label: Follow-up, honor commitment and deliver promises

value.fullName: Believe in the capabilities of others, seek their input, and trust their motives
value.label: Believe in the capabilities of others, seek their input, and trust their motives

value.fullName: Strive to create a positive atmosphere by engaging in behaviors that will promote open communication and effective collaboration
value.label: Strive to create a positive atmosphere by engaging in behaviors that will promote open communication and effective collaboration

value.fullName: Take pride in producing high quality work and deliver / exceed expectations to achieve common good and inspire others to do the same
value.label: Take pride in producing high quality work and deliver / exceed expectations to achieve common good and inspire others to do the same
